transaction Class

Defined in: lib/api/transaction.js:2
Module: transaction
Parent Module: arango

The api module to execute transactions in ArangoDB.

  • Index
  • Methods

Item Index

Methods

  • submit

Methods

submit

(
  • collection
  • action
  • [options]
  • callback
)
Promise

Defined in lib/api/transaction.js:12

Parameters:

  • collection Object
    • contains the list of collections to be used in the transaction (mandatory). collections must be a JSON array that can have the optional sub-attributes read and write. read and write must each be either lists of collections names or strings with a single collection name.
  • action String
    • the actual transaction operations to be executed, in the form of stringified Javascript code.
  • [options] Object optional
    • a JSON Object contatining optional parameter:
    • [params] Object optional
      • optional arguments passed to action.
    • [waitForSync=false] Object optional
      • if set, will force the transaction to write all data to disk before returning.
    • [lockTimeout] Object optional
      • a numeric value that can be used to set a timeout for waiting on collection locks. If not specified, a default value will be used. Setting lockTimeout to 0 will make ArangoDB not time out waiting for a lock.
    • [replicate=true] Object optional
      • whether or not to replicate the operations from this transaction.
  • callback Function
    • The callback function.

Returns:

Promise:
